Therefore, we define κ=k∞𝜅subscript𝑘\kappa=k_{\infty}italic_κ = italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∞ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and replace ktsubscript𝑘𝑡k_{t}italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT with κ𝜅\kappaitalic_κ, and the update becomes:

𝐠~t|t−1subscript~𝐠conditional𝑡𝑡1\displaystyle\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t|t-1}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t | italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =𝐠~t−1+1B⁢∑ξ∈ℬt∇f⁢(𝐱t+γ⁢𝐝t−1;ξ)−∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ)γabsentsubscript~𝐠𝑡11𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝛾subscript𝐝𝑡1𝜉∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉𝛾\displaystyle=\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}% \frac{\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_% {t};\xi)}{\gamma}= over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ end_ARG (Prediction)
𝐠~tsubscript~𝐠𝑡\displaystyle\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =𝐠~t|t−1+κ⁢(𝐠t−𝐠~t|t−1)absentsubscript~𝐠conditional𝑡𝑡1𝜅subscript𝐠𝑡subscript~𝐠conditional𝑡𝑡1\displaystyle=\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t|t-1}+\kappa(\mathbf{g}_{t}-\tilde{\mathbf{% g}}_{t|t-1})= over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t | italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_κ ( bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t | italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) (Correction)

Rearrange the terms, we have:

𝐠~tsubscript~𝐠𝑡\displaystyle\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =(1−κ)⁢𝐠~t+κ⁢𝐠t+(1−κ)⁢1B⁢∑ξ∈ℬt∇f⁢(𝐱t+γ⁢𝐝t−1;ξ)−∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ)γabsent1𝜅subscript~𝐠𝑡𝜅subscript𝐠𝑡1𝜅1𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝛾subscript𝐝𝑡1𝜉∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉𝛾\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}+\kappa\mathbf{g}_{t}+(1-\kappa)% \frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\frac{\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma% \mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)}{\gamma}= ( 1 - italic_κ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_κ bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ( 1 - italic_κ ) divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ end_ARG
=(1−κ)⁢𝐠~t+κ⁢𝐠^t, withabsent1𝜅subscript~𝐠𝑡𝜅subscript^𝐠𝑡 with\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}+\kappa\hat{\mathbf{g}}_{t},% \text{ with}= ( 1 - italic_κ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_κ over^ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , with
𝐠^tsubscript^𝐠𝑡\displaystyle\hat{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over^ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =𝐠t+1−κκ⁢1B⁢∑ξ∈ℬt∇f⁢(𝐱t+γ⁢𝐝t−1;ξ)−∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ)γabsentsubscript𝐠𝑡1𝜅𝜅1𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝛾subscript𝐝𝑡1𝜉∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉𝛾\displaystyle=\mathbf{g}_{t}+\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa}\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in% \mathcal{B}_{t}}\frac{\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-% \nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)}{\gamma}= bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ end_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ end_ARG
=1B⁢∑ξ∈ℬt(1−κκ⁢γ⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t+γ⁢𝐝t−1;ξ)+(1−1−κκ⁢γ)⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ))+𝐰t,absent1𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡1𝜅𝜅𝛾∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝛾subscript𝐝𝑡1𝜉11𝜅𝜅𝛾∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉subscript𝐰𝑡\displaystyle=\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\frac{1-\kappa}{% \kappa\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)+\left(1-\frac% {1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}\right)\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)+\mathbf{w}_% {t},= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ italic_γ end_ARG ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) + ( 1 - divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ italic_γ end_ARG ) ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) ) + bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where we substitute 𝐠t=1B⁢∑ξ∈ℬtclip⁢(∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ),C)+𝐰t.subscript𝐠𝑡1𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡clip∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉𝐶subscript𝐰𝑡\mathbf{g}_{t}=\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\mathrm{clip}\left(% \nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi),C\right)+\mathbf{w}_{t}.bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_clip ( ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) , italic_C ) + bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT . Then, by privatizing 𝐠^tsubscript^𝐠𝑡\hat{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over^ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and rename it as 𝐠tsubscript𝐠𝑡\mathbf{g}_{t}bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we have:

𝐠tsubscript𝐠𝑡\displaystyle\mathbf{g}_{t}bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =1B⁢∑ξ∈ℬtclip⁢(1−κκ⁢γ⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t+γ⁢𝐝t−1;ξ)+(1−1−κκ⁢γ)⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ),C)+𝐰tabsent1𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡clip1𝜅𝜅𝛾∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝛾subscript𝐝𝑡1𝜉11𝜅𝜅𝛾∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉𝐶subscript𝐰𝑡\displaystyle=\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\mathrm{clip}\left(\frac{% 1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)+% \left(1-\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}\right)\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi),C% \right)+\mathbf{w}_{t}= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_clip ( divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ italic_γ end_ARG ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) + ( 1 - divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ italic_γ end_ARG ) ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) , italic_C ) + bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
𝐠~tsubscript~𝐠𝑡\displaystyle\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =(1−κ)⁢𝐠~t+κ⁢𝐠t,absent1𝜅subscript~𝐠𝑡𝜅subscript𝐠𝑡\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}+\kappa\mathbf{g}_{t},= ( 1 - italic_κ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_κ bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

which is the update of Algorithm 3 (Lines 5 and 6).

A.4 Connection between DiSK and NAG and STORM

Algorithm 3 has an implicit connection to the (unified) Nesterov Accelerated Gradient (NAG) method (Shen et al., 2023; Sutskever et al., 2013) \xweditand the Stochastic Recursive Momentum (STORM) algorithm (Cutkosky & Orabona, 2019). The update of (half-shifted) NAG can be written as (Sutskever et al., 2013):

𝐦tsubscript𝐦𝑡\displaystyle\mathbf{m}_{t}bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =μ⁢𝐦t−1+η⁢∇F⁢(𝐱t−μ⁢𝐦t−1)absent𝜇subscript𝐦𝑡1𝜂∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡𝜇subscript𝐦𝑡1\displaystyle=\mu\mathbf{m}_{t-1}+\eta\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t}-\mu\mathbf{m}_{t% -1})= italic_μ bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_η ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_μ bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) (16)
𝐱t+1subscript𝐱𝑡1\displaystyle\mathbf{x}_{t+1}bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =𝐱t−𝐦t,absentsubscript𝐱𝑡subscript𝐦𝑡\displaystyle=\mathbf{x}_{t}-\mathbf{m}_{t},= bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,
\xwedit

and the update of STORM writes (Cutkosky & Orabona, 2019):

𝐦tsubscript𝐦𝑡\displaystyle\mathbf{m}_{t}bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =(1−α)⁢𝐦t−1+α⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t,ξt)+(1−α)⁢(∇f⁢(𝐱t,ξt)−∇f⁢(𝐱t−1,ξt))absent1𝛼subscript𝐦𝑡1𝛼∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡subscript𝜉𝑡1𝛼∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡subscript𝜉𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡1subscript𝜉𝑡\displaystyle=(1-\alpha)\mathbf{m}_{t-1}+\alpha\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t},\xi_{t}% )+(1-\alpha)(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t},\xi_{t})-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1},\xi_{t% }))= ( 1 - italic_α ) bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_α ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + ( 1 - italic_α ) ( ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) (17)
𝐱t+1subscript𝐱𝑡1\displaystyle\mathbf{x}_{t+1}bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =𝐱t−η⁢𝐦t,absentsubscript𝐱𝑡𝜂subscript𝐦𝑡\displaystyle=\mathbf{x}_{t}-\eta\mathbf{m}_{t},= bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_η bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

In comparison, in Algorithm 3, \xweditby letting the update of OptimizerUpdate be SGD, and assuming clipping is inactive, 𝐰t=0subscript𝐰𝑡0\mathbf{w}_{t}=0bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = 0, i.e., without DP, ϵ→∞→italic-ϵ\epsilon\rightarrow\inftyitalic_ϵ → ∞, the DiSK becomes:

𝐠~tsubscript~𝐠𝑡\displaystyle\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =(1−κ)⁢𝐠~t−1+κB⁢∑ξ∈ℬt(1−κκ⁢γ⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t+γ⁢𝐝t−1;ξ)+(1−1−κκ⁢γ)⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ))absent1𝜅subscript~𝐠𝑡1𝜅𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡1𝜅𝜅𝛾∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝛾subscript𝐝𝑡1𝜉11𝜅𝜅𝛾∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\frac{\kappa}{B}\sum_{\xi\in% \mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+% \gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)+\big{(}1-\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}\big{)}% \nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)= ( 1 - italic_κ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ italic_γ end_ARG ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) + ( 1 - divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ italic_γ end_ARG ) ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) ) (18)
=(1−κ)⁢𝐠~t−1+κB⁢∑ξ∈ℬt∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ)+1−κB⁢γ⁢∑ξ∈ℬt(∇f⁢(𝐱t+γ⁢𝐝t−1;ξ)−∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ))absent1𝜅subscript~𝐠𝑡1𝜅𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉1𝜅𝐵𝛾subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝛾subscript𝐝𝑡1𝜉∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\frac{\kappa}{B}\sum_{\xi\in% \mathcal{B}_{t}}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)+\frac{1-\kappa}{B\gamma}\sum_{\xi% \in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-% \nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)= ( 1 - italic_κ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) + divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_B italic_γ end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) )
𝐱t+1subscript𝐱𝑡1\displaystyle\mathbf{x}_{t+1}bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =𝐱t−η⁢𝐠~t.absentsubscript𝐱𝑡𝜂subscript~𝐠𝑡\displaystyle=\mathbf{x}_{t}-\eta\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}.= bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_η over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Comparing the above updates, we observe that (16) and (17) are two special cases of (18) with specific choices of the parameters. Specifically, by letting γ=1−κκ>0,η=κ,1−κ=μformulae-sequence𝛾1𝜅𝜅0formulae-sequence𝜂𝜅1𝜅𝜇\gamma=\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa}>0,\eta=\kappa,1-\kappa=\muitalic_γ = divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ end_ARG > 0 , italic_η = italic_κ , 1 - italic_κ = italic_μ, B=N𝐵𝑁B=Nitalic_B = italic_N, we have 1−1−κκ⁢γ=011𝜅𝜅𝛾01-\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}=01 - divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ italic_γ end_ARG = 0, and the update of 𝐠~tsubscript~𝐠𝑡\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT becomes 𝐠~t=μ⁢𝐠~t−1+η⁢∇F⁢(𝐱t−μη⁢𝐠~t−1)subscript~𝐠𝑡𝜇subscript~𝐠𝑡1𝜂∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡𝜇𝜂subscript~𝐠𝑡1\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}=\mu\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\eta\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t}% -\frac{\mu}{\eta}\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1})over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_μ over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_η ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_μ end_ARG start_ARG italic_η end_ARG over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ), and DiSK becomes NAG; on the other hand, by letting γ=−1,κ=αformulae-sequence𝛾1𝜅𝛼\gamma=-1,\kappa=\alphaitalic_γ = - 1 , italic_κ = italic_α, B=1𝐵1B=1italic_B = 1, we have 𝐱t+γ⁢𝐝t−1=𝐱t−(𝐱t−𝐱t−1)=𝐱t−1subscript𝐱𝑡𝛾subscript𝐝𝑡1subscript𝐱𝑡subscript𝐱𝑡subscript𝐱𝑡1subscript𝐱𝑡1\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1}=\mathbf{x}_{t}-(\mathbf{x}_{t}-\mathbf{x% }_{t-1})=\mathbf{x}_{t-1}bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, and the update of 𝐠~tsubscript~𝐠𝑡\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT becomes 𝐠~t=(1−α)⁢𝐠~t−1+α⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξt)+(1−α)⁢(∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ)−∇f⁢(𝐱t−1;ξ))subscript~𝐠𝑡1𝛼subscript~𝐠𝑡1𝛼∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡subscript𝜉𝑡1𝛼∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡1𝜉\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}=(1-\alpha)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\alpha\nabla f(% \mathbf{x}_{t};\xi_{t})+(1-\alpha)\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)-\nabla f(% \mathbf{x}_{t-1};\xi)\right)over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ( 1 - italic_α ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_α ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + ( 1 - italic_α ) ( ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) ), which matches the update of STORM. From this discussion, we see that NAG and STORM, two algorithms for accelerated gradient and variance reduction, respectively, can be unified by DiSK, an algorithm based on Kalman filtering.

With this discussion, we observe that the key difference between NAG and STORM is the choice of γ𝛾\gammaitalic_γ. When γ>0,𝛾0\gamma>0,italic_γ > 0 , the algorithm is close to NAG, which focuses on “exploring” and “accelerating”. When γ<0𝛾0\gamma<0italic_γ < 0, the algorithm is close to STORM, which focuses on “exploiting” and “reducing noise”.

Appendix B Proof for Section 4

In this section, we provide detailed proof for the results in Section 4.

We find the following relations useful:

⟨𝐚,𝐛⟩𝐚𝐛\displaystyle\left\langle\mathbf{a},\mathbf{b}\right\rangle⟨ bold_a , bold_b ⟩ ≤12⁢α⁢∥𝐚∥2+α2⁢∥𝐛∥2,absent12𝛼superscriptdelimited-∥∥𝐚2𝛼2superscriptdelimited-∥∥𝐛2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{2\alpha}\left\lVert\mathbf{a}\right\rVert^{2}+\frac{% \alpha}{2}\left\lVert\mathbf{b}\right\rVert^{2},≤ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_α end_ARG ∥ bold_a ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_α end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ∥ bold_b ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , (19)
∥𝐚+𝐛∥2superscriptdelimited-∥∥𝐚𝐛2\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}\right\rVert^{2}∥ bold_a + bold_b ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤(1+α)⁢∥𝐚∥2+(1+1/α)⁢∥𝐛∥2.absent1𝛼superscriptdelimited-∥∥𝐚211𝛼superscriptdelimited-∥∥𝐛2\displaystyle\leq(1+\alpha)\left\lVert\mathbf{a}\right\rVert^{2}+(1+1/\alpha)% \left\lVert\mathbf{b}\right\rVert^{2}.≤ ( 1 + italic_α ) ∥ bold_a ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( 1 + 1 / italic_α ) ∥ bold_b ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT . (20)

In the following sections, we use 𝔼tsubscript𝔼𝑡\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT to denote the expectation conditioned on all the information before iteration t𝑡titalic_t. To prove Theorem 2, we first provide the following lemma to bound the difference between 𝐠~tsubscript~𝐠𝑡\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and ∇F⁢(𝐱t)∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Let us define Δt=∇F⁢(𝐱t)−𝐠~tsubscriptΔ𝑡∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡subscript~𝐠𝑡\Delta_{t}=\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. We have: \xwedit

Lemma 1

Assume A1, A2 holds, we have:

𝔼t∥Δt∥2\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert\Delta_{t}\right\rVert^{2}blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤(1−κ)2⁢(1+4⁢η2⁢L2+|1+γ|⁢(κ+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢Cγ))⁢∥Δt−1∥2absentsuperscript1𝜅214superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿21𝛾𝜅2superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2subscript𝐶𝛾superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscriptΔ𝑡12\displaystyle\leq(1-\kappa)^{2}\left(1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)\right)\left\lVert% \Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}≤ ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_γ | ( italic_κ + 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢(1−κ)2⁢(2+|1+γ|⁢Cγ)⁢∥∇F⁢(𝐱t−1)∥22superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2superscript1𝜅221𝛾subscript𝐶𝛾superscriptdelimited-∥∥∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡12\displaystyle\quad+2\eta^{2}L^{2}(1-\kappa)^{2}\left(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right)\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1})\right% \rVert^{2}+ 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
+κ2⁢((2+|1+γ|)⁢σSGD2B+d⁢σDP2),superscript𝜅221𝛾subscriptsuperscript𝜎2SGD𝐵𝑑subscriptsuperscript𝜎2DP\displaystyle\quad+\kappa^{2}\left((2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)\frac{% \sigma^{2}_{\text{SGD}}}{B}+d\sigma^{2}_{\text{DP}}\right),+ italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | ) divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT SGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG + italic_d italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT DP end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , (21)

where we define Cγ=(1+4⁢(2+1/κ+|1+γ|)γ2).subscript𝐶𝛾1421𝜅1𝛾superscript𝛾2C_{\gamma}=\left(1+\frac{4(2+1/\kappa+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)}{% \gamma^{2}}\right).italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ( 1 + divide start_ARG 4 ( 2 + 1 / italic_κ + | 1 + italic_γ | ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) .

B.1 Proof of Lemma 1

By the update of 𝐠~tsubscript~𝐠𝑡\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we have:

𝔼t∥Δt∥2\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert\Delta_{t}\right\rVert^{2}blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=𝔼t∥∇F⁢(𝐱t)−(1−κ)⁢𝐠~t−1−κB⁢∑ξ∈ℬt∇f⁢(𝐱t,ξ)−κ⁢𝐰tabsentconditionalsubscript𝔼𝑡∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡1𝜅subscript~𝐠𝑡1𝜅𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉𝜅subscript𝐰𝑡\displaystyle=\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\|\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-(1-% \kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}-\frac{\kappa}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}% \nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t},\xi)-\kappa\mathbf{w}_{t}\right.= blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ( 1 - italic_κ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_ξ ) - italic_κ bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
−1−κγ⁢B∑ξ∈ℬt(∇f(𝐱t+γ𝐝t−1;ξ)−∇f(𝐱t;ξ))∥2\displaystyle\qquad\qquad\left.-\frac{1-\kappa}{\gamma B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{% B}_{t}}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\nabla f(% \mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)\right\|^{2}- divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(a)𝔼t∥(1−κ)⁢(∇F⁢(𝐱t)−∇F⁢(𝐱t−1))+(1−κ)⁢(∇F⁢(𝐱t−1)−𝐠~t−1)superscript𝑎absentconditionalsubscript𝔼𝑡1𝜅∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡11𝜅∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡1subscript~𝐠𝑡1\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{=}}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}% \left\|(1-\kappa)(\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1}))+(1-% \kappa)(\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1})-\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1})\right.start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG = end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_a ) end_ARG end_RELOP blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ ( 1 - italic_κ ) ( ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) + ( 1 - italic_κ ) ( ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
+κ⁢(∇F⁢(𝐱t)−1B⁢∑ξ∈ℬt∇f⁢(𝐱t,ξ)−𝐰t)𝜅∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡1𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉subscript𝐰𝑡\displaystyle\qquad\qquad+\kappa\left(\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\frac{1}{B}\sum% _{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t},\xi)-\mathbf{w}_{t}\right)+ italic_κ ( ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_ξ ) - bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
−1−κγ⁢B∑ξ∈ℬt(∇f(𝐱t+γ𝐝t−1;ξ)−∇f(𝐱t;ξ))∥2\displaystyle\qquad\qquad-\frac{1-\kappa}{\gamma B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}% }\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}% _{t};\xi)\right)\big{\|}^{2}- divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(b)𝔼t∥(1−κ)⁢(∇F⁢(𝐱t)−∇F⁢(𝐱t−1)−1B⁢∑ξ∈ℬt(∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ)−∇f⁢(𝐱t−1;ξ)))⏟:=D1superscript𝑏absentconditionalsubscript𝔼𝑡1𝜅subscript⏟∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡11𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡1𝜉assignabsentsubscript𝐷1\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(b)}}{{=}}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}% \Bigg{\|}(1-\kappa)\underbrace{\left(\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\nabla F(\mathbf% {x}_{t-1})-\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t% };\xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1};\xi)\right)\right)}_{:=D_{1}}start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG = end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_b ) end_ARG end_RELOP blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ ( 1 - italic_κ ) under⏟ start_ARG ( ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) ) ) end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT := italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+(1−κ)⁢Δt−1+κ⁢(∇F⁢(𝐱t)−1B⁢∑ξ∈ℬt∇f⁢(𝐱t,ξ))⏟:=D2−κ⁢𝐰t1𝜅subscriptΔ𝑡1𝜅subscript⏟∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡1𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉assignabsentsubscript𝐷2𝜅subscript𝐰𝑡\displaystyle\qquad\qquad+(1-\kappa)\Delta_{t-1}+\kappa\underbrace{\left(% \nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\nabla f(% \mathbf{x}_{t},\xi)\right)}_{:=D_{2}}-\kappa\mathbf{w}_{t}+ ( 1 - italic_κ ) roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_κ under⏟ start_ARG ( ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_ξ ) ) end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT := italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_κ bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
−(1−κ)1B⁢∑ξ∈ℬt(1γ⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t+γ⁢𝐝t−1;ξ)+∇f⁢(𝐱t−1⁢𝐝t−1;ξ)−1+γγ⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ))⏟:=D3∥2\displaystyle\qquad\qquad-(1-\kappa)\underbrace{\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in% \mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\frac{1}{\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}% _{t-1};\xi)+\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1}\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\frac{1+\gamma}{% \gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)}_{:=D_{3}}\Bigg{\|}^{2}- ( 1 - italic_κ ) under⏟ start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ end_ARG ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_γ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) + ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - divide start_ARG 1 + italic_γ end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ end_ARG ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) ) end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT := italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(c)(1−κ)2𝔼t∥D1∥2+(1−κ)2∥Δt−1∥2+κ2𝔼t[∥D2∥2]+(1−κ)2𝔼t∥D3∥2+κ2𝔼[∥𝐰t∥2]\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(c)}}{{=}}(1-\kappa)^{2}\operatorname{% \mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert D_{1}\right\rVert^{2}+(1-\kappa)^{2}\left\lVert% \Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}+\kappa^{2}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left% \lVert D_{2}\right\rVert^{2}]+(1-\kappa)^{2}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left% \lVert D_{3}\right\rVert^{2}+\kappa^{2}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}[\left\lVert% \mathbf{w}_{t}\right\rVert^{2}]start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG = end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_c ) end_ARG end_RELOP ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] + ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E [ ∥ bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ]
+2⁢(1−κ)2⁢⟨𝔼t⁡[D1],Δt−1⟩+2⁢(1−κ)⁢κ⁢⟨𝔼t⁡[D2],Δt−1⟩−2⁢(1−κ)2⁢⟨𝔼t⁡[D3],Δt−1⟩2superscript1𝜅2subscript𝔼𝑡subscript𝐷1subscriptΔ𝑡121𝜅𝜅subscript𝔼𝑡subscript𝐷2subscriptΔ𝑡12superscript1𝜅2subscript𝔼𝑡subscript𝐷3subscriptΔ𝑡1\displaystyle\quad+2(1-\kappa)^{2}\left\langle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[D_% {1}],\Delta_{t-1}\right\rangle+2(1-\kappa)\kappa\left\langle\operatorname{% \mathbb{E}}_{t}[D_{2}],\Delta_{t-1}\right\rangle-2(1-\kappa)^{2}\left\langle% \operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[D_{3}],\Delta_{t-1}\right\rangle+ 2 ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⟨ blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] , roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⟩ + 2 ( 1 - italic_κ ) italic_κ ⟨ blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] , roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⟩ - 2 ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⟨ blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] , roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⟩
+2⁢𝔼t⁡[⟨(1−κ)⁢D1,κ⁢D2⟩]−2⁢(1−κ)2⁢𝔼t⁡[⟨D1,D3⟩]−2⁢𝔼t⁡[⟨κ⁢D2,(1−κ)⁢D3⟩],2subscript𝔼𝑡1𝜅subscript𝐷1𝜅subscript𝐷22superscript1𝜅2subscript𝔼𝑡subscript𝐷1subscript𝐷32subscript𝔼𝑡𝜅subscript𝐷21𝜅subscript𝐷3\displaystyle\quad+2\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left\langle(1-\kappa)D_{1},% \kappa D_{2}\right\rangle]-2(1-\kappa)^{2}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left% \langle D_{1},D_{3}\right\rangle]-2\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left\langle% \kappa D_{2},(1-\kappa)D_{3}\right\rangle],+ 2 blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ⟨ ( 1 - italic_κ ) italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_κ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⟩ ] - 2 ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ⟨ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⟩ ] - 2 blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ⟨ italic_κ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ( 1 - italic_κ ) italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⟩ ] ,
=(d)(1−κ)2(2+|1+γ|)𝔼t∥D1∥2+(1−κ)2(1+κ|1+γ|)∥Δt−1∥2+κ2(2+|1+γ|)𝔼t[∥D2∥2]\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(d)}}{{=}}(1-\kappa)^{2}(2+\left\lvert 1+% \gamma\right\rvert)\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert D_{1}\right\rVert^% {2}+(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+\kappa\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)\left\lVert\Delta_% {t-1}\right\rVert^{2}+\kappa^{2}(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)% \operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left\lVert D_{2}\right\rVert^{2}]start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG = end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_d ) end_ARG end_RELOP ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | ) blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + italic_κ | 1 + italic_γ | ) ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | ) blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ]
+(1−κ)2(1+2|1+γ|+1κ⁢|1+γ|)𝔼t∥D3∥2+κ2dσDP2,\displaystyle\quad+(1-\kappa)^{2}\left(1+\frac{2}{\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right% \rvert}+\frac{1}{\kappa\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert}\right)\operatorname{% \mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert D_{3}\right\rVert^{2}+\kappa^{2}d\sigma^{2}_{\text{% DP}},+ ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG | 1 + italic_γ | end_ARG + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ | 1 + italic_γ | end_ARG ) blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT DP end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , (22)

where (a)𝑎(a)( italic_a ) we add and subtract (1−κ)⁢∇F⁢(𝐱t−1)1𝜅∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡1(1-\kappa)\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1})( 1 - italic_κ ) ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) and rearrange the terms; (b)𝑏(b)( italic_b ) adds and subtracts 1−κB⁢∑ξ∈ℬt(∇f⁢(𝐱t;ξ)−∇f⁢(𝐱t−1;ξ))1𝜅𝐵subscript𝜉subscriptℬ𝑡∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡𝜉∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡1𝜉\frac{1-\kappa}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};% \xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1};\xi)\right)divide start_ARG 1 - italic_κ end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) ); (c)𝑐(c)( italic_c ) directly expands the square; and in (d)𝑑(d)( italic_d ), we notice that 𝔼t⁡[D1]=0,𝔼t⁡[D2]=0formulae-sequencesubscript𝔼𝑡subscript𝐷10subscript𝔼𝑡subscript𝐷20\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[D_{1}]=0,\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[D_{2}]=0blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = 0 , blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = 0, so the first two inner products are zero, and we apply (19) to the other four inner products, with α=κ⁢|1+γ|,1,|1+γ|𝛼𝜅1𝛾11𝛾\alpha=\kappa\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert,1,\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvertitalic_α = italic_κ | 1 + italic_γ | , 1 , | 1 + italic_γ |, respectively. Next, we bound each term separately. For 𝔼t⁡[∥D1∥2]subscript𝔼𝑡superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscript𝐷12\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left\lVert D_{1}\right\rVert^{2}]blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ], we have:

≤(a)𝔼t∥1B∑ξ∈ℬt(∇f(𝐱t;ξ)−∇f(𝐱t−1;ξ))∥2\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{\leq}}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}% \left\lVert\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t% };\xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1};\xi)\right)\right\rVert^{2}start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG ≤ end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_a ) end_ARG end_RELOP blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ξ ∈ caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) - ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ) ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

For 𝔼t⁡[∥D3∥2]subscript𝔼𝑡superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscript𝐷32\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left\lVert D_{3}\right\rVert^{2}]blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ], we have:

=(b)4⁢L2⁢(1+γ)2⁢η2γ2⁢∥𝐠~t−1∥2superscript𝑏absent4superscript𝐿2superscript1𝛾2superscript𝜂2superscript𝛾2superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscript~𝐠𝑡12\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(b)}}{{=}}\frac{4L^{2}(1+\gamma)^{2}\eta^{% 2}}{\gamma^{2}}\left\lVert\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG = end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_b ) end_ARG end_RELOP divide start_ARG 4 italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + italic_γ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∥ over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤(c)8⁢L2⁢(1+γ)2⁢η2γ2⁢(∥Δt−1∥2+∥∇F⁢(𝐱t−1)∥2),superscript𝑐absent8superscript𝐿2superscript1𝛾2superscript𝜂2superscript𝛾2superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscriptΔ𝑡12superscriptdelimited-∥∥∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡12\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(c)}}{{\leq}}\frac{8L^{2}(1+\gamma)^{2}% \eta^{2}}{\gamma^{2}}(\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}+\left\lVert% \nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1})\right\rVert^{2}),start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG ≤ end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_c ) end_ARG end_RELOP divide start_ARG 8 italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + italic_γ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ( ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) , (25)

where (a)𝑎(a)( italic_a ) applies Jensens’ inequality to ∥⋅∥2superscriptdelimited-∥∥⋅2\left\lVert\cdot\right\rVert^{2}∥ ⋅ ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, and we add and subtract 1γ⁢∇f⁢(𝐱t−1;ξ)1𝛾∇𝑓subscript𝐱𝑡1𝜉\frac{1}{\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1};\xi)divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ end_ARG ∇ italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_ξ ); (b)𝑏(b)( italic_b ) apples (20); (b)𝑏(b)( italic_b ) uses the fact that 𝐝t−1=𝐱t−𝐱t−1=−η⁢𝐠~t−1subscript𝐝𝑡1subscript𝐱𝑡subscript𝐱𝑡1𝜂subscript~𝐠𝑡1\mathbf{d}_{t-1}=\mathbf{x}_{t}-\mathbf{x}_{t-1}=-\eta\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = - italic_η over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT; and (c)𝑐(c)( italic_c ) adds and subtracts ∇F⁢(𝐱t−1)∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡1\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1})∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ), and applies (20). Plug in (23) – (B.1) to (B.1), we have:

𝔼t∥Δt∥2\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert\Delta_{t}\right\rVert^{2}blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤(1−κ)2(2+|1+γ|)𝔼t∥D1∥2+(1−κ)2(1+κ|1+γ|)∥Δt−1∥2+κ2dσDP2\displaystyle\leq(1-\kappa)^{2}(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)% \operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert D_{1}\right\rVert^{2}+(1-\kappa)^{2}(% 1+\kappa\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{% 2}+\kappa^{2}d\sigma^{2}_{\text{DP}}≤ ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | ) blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + italic_κ | 1 + italic_γ | ) ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT DP end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+κ2(2+|1+γ|)𝔼t[∥D2∥2]+(1−κ)2(1+2|1+γ|+1κ⁢|1+γ|)𝔼t∥D3∥2\displaystyle\quad+\kappa^{2}(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)\operatorname% {\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left\lVert D_{2}\right\rVert^{2}]+(1-\kappa)^{2}\left(1+% \frac{2}{\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert}+\frac{1}{\kappa\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert}\right)\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert D_{3}\right\rVert% ^{2}+ italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | ) blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] + ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG | 1 + italic_γ | end_ARG + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ | 1 + italic_γ | end_ARG ) blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤(1−κ)2⁢(1+4⁢η2⁢L2+|1+γ|⁢(κ+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢Cγ))⁢∥Δt−1∥2absentsuperscript1𝜅214superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿21𝛾𝜅2superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2subscript𝐶𝛾superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscriptΔ𝑡12\displaystyle\leq(1-\kappa)^{2}\left(1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)\right)\left\lVert% \Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}≤ ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_γ | ( italic_κ + 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢(1−κ)2⁢(2+|1+γ|⁢Cγ)⁢∥∇F⁢(𝐱t−1)∥22superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2superscript1𝜅221𝛾subscript𝐶𝛾superscriptdelimited-∥∥∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡12\displaystyle\quad+2\eta^{2}L^{2}(1-\kappa)^{2}\left(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right)\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1})\right% \rVert^{2}+ 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
+κ2⁢((2+|1+γ|)⁢σSGD2B+d⁢σDP2),superscript𝜅221𝛾subscriptsuperscript𝜎2SGD𝐵𝑑subscriptsuperscript𝜎2DP\displaystyle\quad+\kappa^{2}\left((2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)\frac{% \sigma^{2}_{\text{SGD}}}{B}+d\sigma^{2}_{\text{DP}}\right),+ italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | ) divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT SGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG + italic_d italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT DP end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , (26)

where we define Cγ:=(1+4⁢(2+1/κ+|1+γ|)γ2)assignsubscript𝐶𝛾1421𝜅1𝛾superscript𝛾2C_{\gamma}:=\left(1+\frac{4(2+1/\kappa+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)}{% \gamma^{2}}\right)italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT := ( 1 + divide start_ARG 4 ( 2 + 1 / italic_κ + | 1 + italic_γ | ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ). This completes the proof of Lemma 1.

B.2 Proof of Theorem 2

Then, we are ready to prove Theorem 2. By choosing C≥G⁢(1+2⁢(1−κ)κ⁢γ),𝐶𝐺121𝜅𝜅𝛾C\geq G(1+\frac{2(1-\kappa)}{\kappa\gamma}),italic_C ≥ italic_G ( 1 + divide start_ARG 2 ( 1 - italic_κ ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_κ italic_γ end_ARG ) , the clipping is inactive. Recall that from the update rule, we have

𝔼t⁡[𝐠~t]subscript𝔼𝑡subscript~𝐠𝑡\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}]blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] =(1−κ)⁢𝐠~t−1+κ⁢∇F⁢(𝐱t)+(1−κ)⁢(∇F⁢(𝐱t)−∇F⁢(𝐱t−1))absent1𝜅subscript~𝐠𝑡1𝜅∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡1𝜅∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡1\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\kappa\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t}% )+(1-\kappa)(\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1}))= ( 1 - italic_κ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_κ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + ( 1 - italic_κ ) ( ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) (27)
=∇F⁢(𝐱t)−(1−κ)⁢Δt−1.absent∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡1𝜅subscriptΔ𝑡1\displaystyle=\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-(1-\kappa)\Delta_{t-1}.= ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ( 1 - italic_κ ) roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Then, by A1, we have:

𝔼t⁡[F⁢(𝐱t+1)]−limit-fromsubscript𝔼𝑡𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡1\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[F(\mathbf{x}_{t+1})]-blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - F(𝐱t)≤−η⟨∇F(𝐱t),𝔼t[𝐠~t]⟩+η2⁢L2𝔼t∥𝐠~t∥2\displaystyle F(\mathbf{x}_{t})\leq-\eta\left\langle\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t}),% \operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}]\right\rangle+\frac{\eta^% {2}L}{2}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}\right% \rVert^{2}italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ≤ - italic_η ⟨ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ⟩ + divide start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(a)−η∥∇F(𝐱t)∥2+η(1−κ)⟨∇F(𝐱t),Δt−1⟩+η2⁢L2𝔼t∥𝐠~t∥2\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{=}}-\eta\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf% {x}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}+\eta(1-\kappa)\left\langle\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t}),% \Delta_{t-1}\right\rangle+\frac{\eta^{2}L}{2}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}% \left\lVert\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}\right\rVert^{2}start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG = end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_a ) end_ARG end_RELOP - italic_η ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_η ( 1 - italic_κ ) ⟨ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⟩ + divide start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤(b)−η⁢(1+κ−2⁢η⁢L)2∥∇F(𝐱t)∥2+η⁢(1−κ)2∥Δt−1∥2+η2L𝔼t∥Δt∥2,\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(b)}}{{\leq}}-\frac{\eta(1+\kappa-2\eta L)% }{2}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}+\frac{\eta(1-\kappa)}{% 2}\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}+\eta^{2}L\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{% t}\left\lVert\Delta_{t}\right\rVert^{2},start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG ≤ end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_b ) end_ARG end_RELOP - divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 + italic_κ - 2 italic_η italic_L ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 - italic_κ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , (28)

where (a)𝑎(a)( italic_a ) substitute (27); (b)𝑏(b)( italic_b ) applies (19) to the second term and we add and subtract ∇F⁢(𝐱t)∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) to the last term and apply (20).

Define ℒt:=F⁢(𝐱t)+β⁢∥Δt−1∥2assignsubscriptℒ𝑡𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡𝛽superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscriptΔ𝑡12\mathcal{L}_{t}:=F(\mathbf{x}_{t})+\beta\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT := italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_β ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, we have:

𝔼t⁡[ℒt+1]subscript𝔼𝑡subscriptℒ𝑡1\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\mathcal{L}_{t+1}]blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] −ℒtsubscriptℒ𝑡\displaystyle-\mathcal{L}_{t}- caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤−η⁢(1+κ−2⁢η⁢L)2∥∇F(𝐱t)∥2−(β−η⁢(1−κ)2)∥Δt−1∥2+(β+η2L)𝔼t∥Δt∥2\displaystyle\leq-\frac{\eta(1+\kappa-2\eta L)}{2}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{% x}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}-(\beta-\frac{\eta(1-\kappa)}{2})\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1% }\right\rVert^{2}+(\beta+\eta^{2}L)\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert% \Delta_{t}\right\rVert^{2}≤ - divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 + italic_κ - 2 italic_η italic_L ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( italic_β - divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 - italic_κ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ) ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤(a)−η⁢(1+κ−2⁢η⁢L)2⁢∥∇F⁢(𝐱t)∥2−(β−η⁢(1−κ)2)⁢∥Δt−1∥2superscript𝑎absent𝜂1𝜅2𝜂𝐿2superscriptdelimited-∥∥∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡2𝛽𝜂1𝜅2superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscriptΔ𝑡12\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{\leq}}-\frac{\eta(1+\kappa-2\eta L)% }{2}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}-(\beta-\frac{\eta(1-% \kappa)}{2})\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG ≤ end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_a ) end_ARG end_RELOP - divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 + italic_κ - 2 italic_η italic_L ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( italic_β - divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 - italic_κ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ) ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
+(β+η2⁢L)⁢(1−κ)2⁢(1+4⁢L2⁢η2+\xwedit⁢|1+γ|⁢(κ+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢Cγ))⁢∥Δt−1∥2𝛽superscript𝜂2𝐿superscript1𝜅214superscript𝐿2superscript𝜂2\xwedit1𝛾𝜅2superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2subscript𝐶𝛾superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscriptΔ𝑡12\displaystyle\quad+(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+4L^{2}\eta^{2}+\xwedit{% \left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)})% \left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}+ ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_γ | ( italic_κ + 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
+(β+η2⁢L)⁢κ2⁢(\xwedit⁢(2+|1+γ|)⁢σSGD2B+d⁢σDP2)𝛽superscript𝜂2𝐿superscript𝜅2\xwedit21𝛾subscriptsuperscript𝜎2SGD𝐵𝑑subscriptsuperscript𝜎2DP\displaystyle\quad+(\beta+\eta^{2}L)\kappa^{2}\left(\frac{\xwedit{(2+\left% \lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)}\sigma^{2}_{\mathrm{SGD}}}{B}+d\sigma^{2}_{% \mathrm{DP}}\right)+ ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | ) italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_SGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG + italic_d italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_DP end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
+2⁢(β+η2⁢L)⁢(1−κ)2⁢L2⁢η2⁢\xwedit⁢(2+|1+γ|⁢Cγ)⁢∥∇F⁢(𝐱t−1)∥22𝛽superscript𝜂2𝐿superscript1𝜅2superscript𝐿2superscript𝜂2\xwedit21𝛾subscript𝐶𝛾superscriptdelimited-∥∥∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡12\displaystyle\quad+2(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}L^{2}\eta^{2}\xwedit{\left(% 2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right)}\left\lVert\nabla F(% \mathbf{x}_{t-1})\right\rVert^{2}+ 2 ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=−η⁢(1+κ−2⁢η⁢L)2⁢∥∇F⁢(𝐱t)∥2+2⁢(β+η2⁢L)⁢(1−κ)2⁢L2⁢η2⁢\xwedit⁢(2+|1+γ|⁢Cγ)⁢∥∇F⁢(𝐱t−1)∥2absent𝜂1𝜅2𝜂𝐿2superscriptdelimited-∥∥∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡22𝛽superscript𝜂2𝐿superscript1𝜅2superscript𝐿2superscript𝜂2\xwedit21𝛾subscript𝐶𝛾superscriptdelimited-∥∥∇𝐹subscript𝐱𝑡12\displaystyle=-\frac{\eta(1+\kappa-2\eta L)}{2}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_% {t})\right\rVert^{2}+2(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}L^{2}\eta^{2}\xwedit{% \left(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right)}\left\lVert\nabla F% (\mathbf{x}_{t-1})\right\rVert^{2}= - divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 + italic_κ - 2 italic_η italic_L ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 2 ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
−(β−η⁢(1−κ)2−(β+η2⁢L)⁢(1−κ)2⁢(1+4⁢L2⁢η2+\xwedit⁢|1+γ|⁢(κ+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢Cγ)))⁢∥Δt−1∥2𝛽𝜂1𝜅2𝛽superscript𝜂2𝐿superscript1𝜅214superscript𝐿2superscript𝜂2\xwedit1𝛾𝜅2superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2subscript𝐶𝛾superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscriptΔ𝑡12\displaystyle\quad-\left(\beta-\frac{\eta(1-\kappa)}{2}-(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-% \kappa)^{2}(1+4L^{2}\eta^{2}+\xwedit{\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert\left(% \kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)})\right)\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right% \rVert^{2}- ( italic_β - divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 - italic_κ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG - ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_γ | ( italic_κ + 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ) ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

where (a)𝑎(a)( italic_a ) applies Lemma 1 and (b)𝑏(b)( italic_b ) rearrange the terms. By choosing

η<12⁢L⁢(1+2⁢(1−κ)2⁢β⁢L⁢(2+|1+γ|⁢Cγ)),κ>1−11+4⁢η2⁢L2+\xwedit⁢|1+γ|⁢(κ+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢Cγ),formulae-sequence𝜂12𝐿12superscript1𝜅2𝛽𝐿21𝛾subscript𝐶𝛾𝜅1114superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2\xwedit1𝛾𝜅2superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2subscript𝐶𝛾\eta<\frac{1}{2L(1+2(1-\kappa)^{2}\beta L(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert C% _{\gamma}))},\;\kappa>1-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+\xwedit{\left\lvert 1+% \gamma\right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)}}},italic_η < divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L ( 1 + 2 ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_β italic_L ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) end_ARG , italic_κ > 1 - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG 1 + 4 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_γ | ( italic_κ + 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG end_ARG ,
β≥η⁢(1−κ)/2+η2⁢L⁢(1−κ)2⁢(1+4⁢η2⁢L2+\xwedit⁢|1+γ|⁢(κ+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢Cγ))1−(1−κ)2⁢(1+4⁢η2⁢L2+\xwedit⁢|1+γ|⁢(κ+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢Cγ)),𝛽𝜂1𝜅2superscript𝜂2𝐿superscript1𝜅214superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2\xwedit1𝛾𝜅2superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2subscript𝐶𝛾1superscript1𝜅214superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2\xwedit1𝛾𝜅2superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2subscript𝐶𝛾\beta\geq\frac{\eta(1-\kappa)/2+\eta^{2}L(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+% \xwedit{\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}% \right)})}{1-(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+\xwedit{\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)})},italic_β ≥ divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 - italic_κ ) / 2 + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_γ | ( italic_κ + 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) end_ARG start_ARG 1 - ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_γ | ( italic_κ + 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) end_ARG ,

we have:

η⁢(1+κ−2⁢η⁢L)2−2⁢(β+η2⁢L)⁢(1−κ)2⁢L2⁢η2⁢\xwedit⁢(2+|1+γ|⁢Cγ)>0,𝜂1𝜅2𝜂𝐿22𝛽superscript𝜂2𝐿superscript1𝜅2superscript𝐿2superscript𝜂2\xwedit21𝛾subscript𝐶𝛾0\displaystyle\frac{\eta(1+\kappa-2\eta L)}{2}-2(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}% L^{2}\eta^{2}\xwedit{\left(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right% )}>0,divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 + italic_κ - 2 italic_η italic_L ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG - 2 ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) > 0 , (30)
1−(1−κ)2⁢(1+4⁢η2⁢L2+\xwedit⁢|1+γ|⁢(κ+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢Cγ))>0,1superscript1𝜅214superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2\xwedit1𝛾𝜅2superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2subscript𝐶𝛾0\displaystyle 1-(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+\xwedit{\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)})>0,1 - ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_γ | ( italic_κ + 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) > 0 ,
β−η⁢(1−κ)2−(β+η2⁢L)⁢(1−κ)2⁢(1+4⁢L2⁢η2+\xwedit⁢|1+γ|⁢(κ+2⁢η2⁢L2⁢Cγ))≥0.𝛽𝜂1𝜅2𝛽superscript𝜂2𝐿superscript1𝜅214superscript𝐿2superscript𝜂2\xwedit1𝛾𝜅2superscript𝜂2superscript𝐿2subscript𝐶𝛾0\displaystyle\beta-\frac{\eta(1-\kappa)}{2}-(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+% 4L^{2}\eta^{2}+\xwedit{\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L% ^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)})\geq 0.italic_β - divide start_ARG italic_η ( 1 - italic_κ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG - ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_γ | ( italic_κ + 2 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ≥ 0 .

Average from t=0𝑡0t=0italic_t = 0 to T−1𝑇1T-1italic_T - 1 and rearrange the terms, we have:

1T∑t=0T𝔼∥∇F(𝐱t)∥2≤2⁢(ℒ0−𝔼⁡[ℒT+1])C1⁢η⁢T+2⁢(β+η2⁢L)⁢κ2C1⁢η(\xwedit⁢(2+|1+γ|)⁢σSGD2B+dσDP2)\displaystyle\frac{1}{T}\sum^{T}_{t=0}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}\left\lVert% \nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}\leq\frac{2(\mathcal{L}_{0}-% \operatorname{\mathbb{E}}[\mathcal{L}_{T+1}])}{C_{1}\eta T}+\frac{2(\beta+\eta% ^{2}L)\kappa^{2}}{C_{1}\eta}\left(\frac{\xwedit{(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right% \rvert)}\sigma^{2}_{\mathrm{SGD}}}{B}+d\sigma^{2}_{\mathrm{DP}}\right)divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ divide start_ARG 2 ( caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - blackboard_E [ caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η italic_T end_ARG + divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η end_ARG ( divide start_ARG ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | ) italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_SGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG + italic_d italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_DP end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
≤2⁢(F⁢(𝐱0)+β⁢∥∇F⁢(𝐱0)∥2−F⋆)C1⁢η⁢T+2⁢(β+η2⁢L)⁢κ2C1⁢η⁢(\xwedit⁢(2+|1+γ|)⁢σSGD2B+d⁢σDP2),absent2𝐹subscript𝐱0𝛽superscriptdelimited-∥∥∇𝐹subscript𝐱02superscript𝐹⋆subscript𝐶1𝜂𝑇2𝛽superscript𝜂2𝐿superscript𝜅2subscript𝐶1𝜂\xwedit21𝛾subscriptsuperscript𝜎2SGD𝐵𝑑subscriptsuperscript𝜎2DP\displaystyle\quad\leq\frac{2(F(\mathbf{x}_{0})+\beta\left\lVert\nabla F(% \mathbf{x}_{0})\right\rVert^{2}-F^{\star})}{C_{1}\eta T}+\frac{2(\beta+\eta^{2% }L)\kappa^{2}}{C_{1}\eta}\left(\frac{\xwedit{(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right% \rvert)}\sigma^{2}_{\mathrm{SGD}}}{B}+d\sigma^{2}_{\mathrm{DP}}\right),≤ divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_β ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_F start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η italic_T end_ARG + divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) italic_κ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η end_ARG ( divide start_ARG ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | ) italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_SGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG + italic_d italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_DP end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , (31)

where we define C1:=(1+κ−2⁢η⁢L)−4⁢(β+η2⁢L)⁢(1−κ)2⁢L2⁢η⁢\xwedit⁢(2+|1+γ|⁢Cγ),assignsubscript𝐶11𝜅2𝜂𝐿4𝛽superscript𝜂2𝐿superscript1𝜅2superscript𝐿2𝜂\xwedit21𝛾subscript𝐶𝛾C_{1}:=(1+\kappa-2\eta L)-4(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}L^{2}\eta\xwedit{% \left(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right)},italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT := ( 1 + italic_κ - 2 italic_η italic_L ) - 4 ( italic_β + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_κ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η ( 2 + | 1 + italic_γ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_γ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , and in the last inequality we notice that ℒT+1=F⁢(𝐱T+1)+β⁢∥ΔT∥2≥F⋆,subscriptℒ𝑇1𝐹subscript𝐱𝑇1𝛽superscriptdelimited-∥∥subscriptΔ𝑇2superscript𝐹⋆\mathcal{L}_{T+1}=F(\mathbf{x}_{T+1})+\beta\left\lVert\Delta_{T}\right\rVert^{% 2}\geq F^{\star},caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_β ∥ roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥ italic_F start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , and ℒ0=F⁢(𝐱0)+β⁢∥∇F⁢(𝐱0)∥2,subscriptℒ0𝐹subscript𝐱0𝛽superscriptdelimited-∥∥∇𝐹subscript𝐱02\mathcal{L}_{0}=F(\mathbf{x}_{0})+\beta\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{0})% \right\rVert^{2},caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_β ∥ ∇ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , as we initialize 𝐠~0=0.subscript~𝐠00\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{0}=0.over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = 0 . This completes the proof of Theorem 2.

\xwedit

On the choice of γ=−1𝛾1\gamma=-1italic_γ = - 1. From the above proof, we see that in Appendix B.1, (B.1) (c)𝑐(c)( italic_c ), we directly apply (19) to upper bound the cross-product terms by positive terms for the worst case, which results in the optimal choice of γ=−1𝛾1\gamma=-1italic_γ = - 1. However, the inner products may be smaller than zero in some cases, making γ=−1𝛾1\gamma=-1italic_γ = - 1 sub-optimal in practice.

Appendix C Additional numerical results

C.1 Experiment details

Coding: The code for the experiments will be provided online. We use PyTorch as the code base and the FastDP package (Bu et al., 2023) to privatize the optimizers. The Algorithm 3 is implemented as a PyTorch optimizer, which can be easily combined with any training scripts based on PyTorch. The modification is minimum:

⬇
1from KFOptimizer import KFOptimizer
2# define base optimizer
3optimizer = KFOptimizer(model.parameters(), base_optimizer, kappa, gamma)
4# ...
5# in training loop:
6 def closure(): # warp up the loss and backward computation
7 loss = model(input)
8 loss.backward()
9 return loss
10 loss = optimizer.prestep(closure)
11 # ...

The link to the full code of the experiments can be found at https://anonymous.4open.science/r/KalmanDP-BEDB.

Hardware: All the experiments except the ImageNet-1k dataset are running with one Nvidia A40 (48GB memory) or one Nvidia V100 (32GB memory). The experiment on the ImageNet-1k dataset is running on one Nvidia H100 (80GB memory) GPU. The training time varies for different tasks depending on the data size and model size.

Training method: We use gradient accumulation to deal with the large batch size and use learning rate warm-up for 1/201201/201 / 20 of the training steps when training from randomly initialized weights. We also use the Cosine Annealing learning rate scheduler (Loshchilov & Hutter, 2022), which gradually decreases the learning rate.

C.2 Choice of hyper-parameters

The main hyper-parameters in the algorithms are: epoch E𝐸Eitalic_E, batch size B𝐵Bitalic_B, step size η𝜂\etaitalic_η, clipping threshold C𝐶Citalic_C, Kalman filter parameters κ𝜅\kappaitalic_κ, and γ𝛾\gammaitalic_γ. In all experiments, we fix the clipping method as automatic clipping used in Bu et al. (2024), i.e., clip⁢(∇f⁢(𝐱;ξ),C)=∇f⁢(𝐱;ξ)⋅C∥∇f⁢(𝐱;ξ)∥,clip∇𝑓𝐱𝜉𝐶⋅∇𝑓𝐱𝜉𝐶delimited-∥∥∇𝑓𝐱𝜉\mathrm{clip}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x};\xi),C\right)=\nabla f(\mathbf{x};\xi)% \cdot\frac{C}{\left\lVert\nabla f(\mathbf{x};\xi)\right\rVert},roman_clip ( ∇ italic_f ( bold_x ; italic_ξ ) , italic_C ) = ∇ italic_f ( bold_x ; italic_ξ ) ⋅ divide start_ARG italic_C end_ARG start_ARG ∥ ∇ italic_f ( bold_x ; italic_ξ ) ∥ end_ARG , and set C=1𝐶1C=1italic_C = 1 for all experiments.

For each set of experiments, we conduct a grid search on the hyper-parameters E,B,η𝐸𝐵𝜂E,B,\etaitalic_E , italic_B , italic_η and choose the optimal ones for the DP optimizer without DiSK. The search grids of each hyper-parameter are listed in Table 2;

Then, we fix E,B.ηformulae-sequence𝐸𝐵𝜂E,B.\etaitalic_E , italic_B . italic_η and conduct the ablation study on κ,γ𝜅𝛾\kappa,\gammaitalic_κ , italic_γ as shown in Figure 8.

C.3 Additional experiments on CV tasks

Training different models from scratch: We additionally train the WRN-16-4 and the ViT-small models on the CIFAR-10 with randomly initialized weights for different privacy budgets, and the test accuracies during the training are shown in Figure 4 for ϵ=4italic-ϵ4\epsilon=4italic_ϵ = 4. From the results, we can see that DiSK consistently outperforms the base optimizer.

Fine-tuning on CIFAR-100: Besides training from scratch, we also compare the performance of fine-tuning a pre-trained ViT-small model on the CIFAR-100 dataset. The results for different ϵitalic-ϵ\epsilonitalic_ϵ are shown in Figure 5. For fine-tuning on the complex CIFAR-100 dataset, DiSK still improves the performance compared with DPAdam, and has less performance drop under large DP noise.

Comparison with existing methods and SOTA: We conduct comparisons with existing approaches for improving DP training performance. In Figure 6(a), we train a linear regression model with synthetic data and compared the performance of Noisy GD, Noisy GD with DOPPLER (NoisyLP), and with DiSK (NoisyKF). We inject Gaussian noise with different variances into the gradient and compare the final performance. We observe that DiSK has the lowest regression loss under all noise levels, indicating that the Kalman filter performs better in noise reduction than the Low-pass filter. In Figure 6(b), we compare the test accuracy of different methods, including DOPPLER (Zhang et al., 2024a) and DP-FTRL (Kairouz et al., 2021; Choquette-Choo et al., 2024) on the CIFAR-10 dataset training the WRN from scratch. We observe that DiSK  significantly outperforms the SOTA algorithms on all privacy budgets.

Comparison with SOTA on ImageNet: Additionally, we conduct experiments to compare the performance of DiSK with SOTA result training from scratch on the ImageNet-1k dataset in De et al. (2022). The result is shown in Figure 7. We note that the reported test accuracy in the De et al. (2022) is 32.4%percent32.432.4\%32.4 % for privacy level ϵ=8italic-ϵ8\epsilon=8italic_ϵ = 8. However, we noticed that their accounting procedure has been improved in their GitHub repository and hence we re-ran their experiment using the new accountant to obtain our baseline. We kept all their options on, including group normalization, larger batch size, weight standardization, augmentation multiplicity, and model exponential moving average. In addition, we also follow their normalized clipping strategy, i.e.,

clip⁢(∇f,C)=∇fC⁢min⁡{C∥∇f∥,1}.clip∇𝑓𝐶∇𝑓𝐶𝐶delimited-∥∥∇𝑓1\mathrm{clip}\left(\nabla f,C\right)=\frac{\nabla f}{C}\min\left\{\frac{C}{% \left\lVert\nabla f\right\rVert},1\right\}.roman_clip ( ∇ italic_f , italic_C ) = divide start_ARG ∇ italic_f end_ARG start_ARG italic_C end_ARG roman_min { divide start_ARG italic_C end_ARG start_ARG ∥ ∇ italic_f ∥ end_ARG , 1 } .

Their updated code results in 36.35%percent36.3536.35\%36.35 % validation accuracy and the test accuracy of 33.56%percent33.5633.56\%33.56 % (as the SOTA result). In comparison, adding DiSK on top of their method results in a validation accuracy of 40%percent4040\%40 % (3.7%percent3.73.7\%3.7 % improvement) and a test accuracy of 36.89%percent36.8936.89\%36.89 % (3.3%percent3.33.3\%3.3 % improvement). This sets a new SOTA result for differentially private training on the ImageNet-1k dataset.

Ablation study: We conduct ablation studies on the choice of the hyper-parameters of DiSK, specifically, how κ,γ𝜅𝛾\kappa,\gammaitalic_κ , italic_γ impact the algorithm performance. In Figure 8, we plot the accuracy on different combinations of (κ,γ)𝜅𝛾(\kappa,\gamma)( italic_κ , italic_γ ), and (κ,ϵ)𝜅italic-ϵ(\kappa,\epsilon)( italic_κ , italic_ϵ ). We observe a clear trend of performance change for different combinations of the parameters, and there is an optimal choice of κ,γ𝜅𝛾\kappa,\gammaitalic_κ , italic_γ for different ϵitalic-ϵ\epsilonitalic_ϵ’s.

C.4 Additional experiments on NLP tasks

In this section, we provide additional results for NLP tasks.

Parameter-efficient fine-tuning on GLUE. We fine-tune a RoBERTa-base and a RoBERTa-large model from the Huggingface checkpoints222https://huggingface.co/FacebookAI/roberta-base,https://huggingface.co/FacebookAI/roberta-large on the GLUE dataset. We follow the same training scripts in Bu et al. (2024) on the hyper-parameter choices of η,B,E𝜂𝐵𝐸\eta,B,Eitalic_η , italic_B , italic_E on the tasks and use rank r=16𝑟16r=16italic_r = 16 for LoRA. We choose κ=0.7,γ=0.5formulae-sequence𝜅0.7𝛾0.5\kappa=0.7,\gamma=0.5italic_κ = 0.7 , italic_γ = 0.5 for DiSK. The results are listed in Table 3. With privacy budget ϵ=1,6.7italic-ϵ16.7\epsilon=1,6.7italic_ϵ = 1 , 6.7, DPLoRA with DiSK significantly outperforms SOTA results with vanilla DPLoRA on all tasks.

Fine-tuning GPT-2 on text generation tasks. We fine-tune a GPT-2-small model with 137⁢M137𝑀137M137 italic_M parameters from the Huggingface checkpoints333https://huggingface.co/openai-community/gpt2 on two text generation datasets, E2E and DART. We follow the same training scripts in Li et al. (2021) on the hyper-parameter choices of η,B,E𝜂𝐵𝐸\eta,B,Eitalic_η , italic_B , italic_E on the tasks and choose κ=0.7,γ=0.5formulae-sequence𝜅0.7𝛾0.5\kappa=0.7,\gamma=0.5italic_κ = 0.7 , italic_γ = 0.5 for DiSK. The results on different metrics for the E2E dataset are given in Table 4, and the results for the DART dataset are in Table 5. With privacy budget ϵ=3,8italic-ϵ38\epsilon=3,8italic_ϵ = 3 , 8, DPAdamW with DiSK significantly outperforms SOTA results with vanilla DPAdamW on all metrics.

C.5 Improvement over SOTA

In the following Table LABEL:tab:app:sota, we provide a list of the experiment settings where our algorithm outperforms SOTA results. The paper that provides the SOTA results is cited for each setting, or the same as the line above. We observe that DiSK provides new SOTA for CV datasets, including CIFAR-10, CIFAR-100, and ImageNet-1k, and NLP datasets, including GLUE (MNLI, QNLI, QQP, SST-2), DART, and E2E.

Instructions for reporting errors

We are continuing to improve HTML versions of papers, and your feedback helps enhance accessibility and mobile support. To report errors in the HTML that will help us improve conversion and rendering, choose any of the methods listed below:

  • Click the "Report Issue" button.
  • Open a report feedback form via keyboard, use "Ctrl + ?".
  • Make a text selection and click the "Report Issue for Selection" button near your cursor.
  • You can use Alt+Y to toggle on and Alt+Shift+Y to toggle off accessible reporting links at each section.

Our team has already identified the following issues. We appreciate your time reviewing and reporting rendering errors we may not have found yet. Your efforts will help us improve the HTML versions for all readers, because disability should not be a barrier to accessing research. Thank you for your continued support in championing open access for all.

Have a free development cycle? Help support accessibility at arXiv! Our collaborators at LaTeXML maintain a list of packages that need conversion, and welcome developer contributions.
